## Notation

- $t$-year event status: $D_t = I(T \leq t)$

- True Positive Rate: $\text{TPR}_t(z) = P(Z \geq z | D_t = 1)$

- False Positive Rate: $\text{FPR}_t(z) = P(Z \geq z | D_t = 0)$

- Positive Predictive Value: $\text{PPV}_t(z) = P(D_t = 1 | Z \geq z)$

- Negative Predictive Value: $\text{NPV}_t(z) = P(D_t = 0 | Z < z)$

- Receiver Operating Characteristic: $\text{ROC}_t(u) = \text{TPR}_t\{\text{FPR}_t^{-1}(u)\}$

- Area Under Curve: $\text{AUC}_t = \int \text{ROC}_t(u) du$

## Estimation

- $\hat{S}(t | z) = \exp[-\hat{\Lambda}_0(t) \exp\{{\hat{\beta} ^\top \phi(z)}\}]$

- $\widehat{\text{TPR}}_t(z) = \dfrac{\sum_{i=1}^n \{1 - \hat{S}(t | Z_i)\} I(Z_i > z)}{\sum_{i=1}^n \{1 - \hat{S}(t | Z_i)\}}$

- $\widehat{\text{FPR}}_t(z) = \dfrac{\sum_{i=1}^n \hat{S}(t | Z_i) I(Z_i > z)}{\sum_{i=1}^n \hat{S}(t | Z_i)}$

- $\widehat{\text{PPV}}_t(z) = \dfrac{\sum_{i=1}^n \{1 - \hat{S}(t | Z_i)\} I(Z_i > z)}{\sum_{i=1}^n I(Z_i \geq z)}$

- $\widehat{\text{NPV}}_t(z) = \dfrac{\sum_{i=1}^n \hat{S}(t | Z_i) I(Z_i < z)}{\sum_{i=1}^n I(Z_i < z)}$

- $\widehat{\text{AUC}}_t = \int \widehat{\text{TPR}}_t\{\widehat{\text{FPR}}_t^{-1}(u)\} du$
